definition: to soak in a spa or hot spring

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces
surname Wen
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
spring (small stream)/mouth of a spring/coin (archaic)

sentences.english: At Lava Hot Springs in Idaho, visitors may bathe in the thermal mineral waters.
sentences.chinese: 當熱熔岩在愛德荷州爆發，參觀者可以去那裏泡溫泉。

sentences.english: You can't use a washcloth in the bath.
sentences.chinese: 泡溫泉時不可以用毛巾洗澡。

sentences.english: I'll treat you to a hot spring.
Toyama prefecture is rich in hot spring resources, and is also known for hot spring bath.
sentences.chinese: 富山縣有很好的溫泉資源，以泡溫泉著稱。

sentences.english: Besides bubble hot spring, this time can also visit Tamil ford fjords.
sentences.chinese: 除了泡溫泉，這個時節還可以去遊覽米爾福德峽灣。

sentences.english: Chili hose jian-ye liu to bubble hot spring, jian-ye liu compliment on the way.
sentences.chinese: 辣椒水帶着劉建業來泡溫泉，劉建業一路恭維。

sentences.english: During the cold winter, there is nothing more enjoyable than bathing in a hot spring.
sentences.chinese: 在寒冷的冬天，沒有什麼事是比去泡溫泉更舒服的了。

sentences.english: But someone will say, bubble hot spring would you like to go abroad, the extravagance.
sentences.chinese: 有人會說，泡溫泉你還要去國外，太奢侈了。

sentences.english: Hot Springs are very good for you.
Then we went to the open-air hot spring.
sentences.chinese: 接着我們要去泡溫泉了。

sentences.english: A:It's the fashion now to enjoy a hot spring.
However, spending time in the hot spring is the real fun.
sentences.chinese: 不過，花些時間泡溫泉纔是真正的樂趣所在。

sentences.english: How about you going to a spa?
This is my first time at the Spa .
sentences.chinese: 呃，這是我第一次泡溫泉。

sentences.english: Marika: I go snowboarding and I go to onsens and I walk around and I enjoy the cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 我冬天去滑雪，泡溫泉，散步，我很享受寒冷的季節。

sentences.english: When we all feel very spiritual, we went to the hot spring.
sentences.chinese: 當我們都睡到精神飽滿時，我們就去泡溫泉了。
